mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, password, member_name, member_call, e_mail, gender, affiliates_id, position_id) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{password},#{member_name}, #{member_call}, #{e_mail}, #{gender}, #{affiliates_id}, #{position_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_call = #{member_call}, e_mail = #{e_mail}, affiliates_id= #{affiliates_id}, position_id= #{position_id}, profile_name = #{profile_name}, profile_uuid = #{profile_uuid}, profile_path = #{profile_path} WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE member_id= (SELECT member_id FROM challenge_join WHERE challenge_id=#{challenge_id})
